article_title: 12 Great Gifts for the Super Rich
article_text:
If you can’t find a gift for the man who has everything, never fear. The shopping blog Cool Material has compiled a gift guide for the one percent, with items even the most blasé person would love.

When money is no object – these outrageously expensive gifts run from $1,500 to $1.6 million – why not purchase a gold mountain bike or a Viking ship for your loved one?

SLIDESHOW: 12 Cool Gifts for the Super Rich

Even if you’ve already done your holiday splurging, you may simply want to salivate in front of your screen. Click here to see the show.
